column4: bah, easiest way to 'configure' samba is right-click on folders and share them just like in 'doze .. why make things harder than they need be?!!
dont you still need to setup samba users for samba to work?
yeah, the first time you share a folder it goes and installs samba for you.
I used to know how to set up samba via the /etc/samba/smb.conf file but ubuntu just makes it so easy. I'm lazy. I do things the easy way.
